divs: sighting detailsin 1999 of may at 2:30am my wife and i were up watching tv when i decided to go outside to smoke a cigarette before i went to bed.i went out the front door and headed to my car to sit on the trunk parked in the drive way.that's when i lit my cigarette.as i was sitting there i always like to observe the stars in the sky. except it was windy and cloudy and couldn't really see anything.that's when i got this eerie feeling that something was behind me.so i turned around to see what was there.as i was looking in the sky behind me above the house just below the clouds a black shape starts to form.at first i thought it was a flock of birds but that is when it started to get bigger and wider.that is when it caught my attention that these are not birds or anything of that nature.it slowly moved over my house and that is when i got a good look in shock.a perfect triangle pitch black with no lights and no sound.it was about two football fields long,one football field wide.i saw the object for a good minute or two as it slowly flew over me just below the clouds.i followed it to the street from my drive way.that is when it slowly went up into the clouds and was not visible.i could not believe my eyes.it was like winning the lotto seeing what i saw for the first time up close and personal.it still give me chills.but wait there's more.as i started to head back to the house to tell my wife what i saw i noticed a bright glowing ball in the direction in which the mother ship came from.(and i do stress the word mother ship) the glowing ball was like no other light i have seen before.it was moving fast ,just below the clouds,no noise in a up and down motion.for sure not a plane.saw for a good 20 sec before it went up into the clouds as the mother ship.that was the icing on the cake.rushing inside to tell my wife the news i hear growling in the bushes next to my car in the driveway.scared shit less already i am wondering what the hell.next thing u know the bush is shaking and sounds like two cats fighting tearing each other up.i panic and run inside to grab something to defend my self.my wife in shock sees me run inside like a mad man zoom past her to grab a broom.trying to explain what happened my adrealine was going so fast i couldnt talk.finally calm my self down and tell her what had happened,we both in shock.she asks why i did not go get her to witness this.i told her i did not want to miss this once in a life time chance to see a real u.f.o. \mother ship.then again i wished i did get her so i wont look so crazy.but i know what i saw and people we are not alone.no plane i know that huge and so low with no sound no lights can exsist. it was meant to be and a sign for things to come.couldn't sleep for nights. just for record i live by the coast and these objects came from the direction of the water by a navel air station.reported to them about my situation.they asked me questions and couldnt tell me if planes were in my area but told me its a possibility i saw something.damm straight i did. thanks for viewing and be happy to answer questions
